title: Proprietary Algorithms
description: Our indicators are powered by custom-built, proprietary algorithms unique to Paytience. These tools are designed to offer analytical insights and enhance your market understanding. The 'Paytience Kit' includes features like built-in entry points, take profit, and stop loss suggestions, along with specialized modes for various altcoins including XRP, HBAR, BTC, and more. Remember, our tools are intended to supplement your trading analysis.

title: TA Classes & Livestreams
description: Join our exclusive TA classes and livestreams in our members-only Discord. These interactive sessions are designed to enhance your trading knowledge and skills.

title: Trading Alerts
description: Stay informed with our Trading Alerts, from our experienced team of six traders. Choose your preferred method of receiving these alerts - Discord, SMS, or Telegram.

title: A.I Trading Assistant
description: Designed to offer educational insights on various trading strategies and indicators. OWL A.I is a valuable resource for enhancing your trading knowledge. Integrated within our discord community.
